DOC.brief_summary: This study design test immunogenicity reactogenicity Fluarix™/Influsplit SSW® contain influenza strain recommend 2007-2008 season .
DOC.brief_title: Immunogenicity Reactogenicity Fluarix™ ( Influsplit SSW® ) 2007/2008 People 18 Years Old Above
DOC.criteria: Healthy male female age 18 year ; Nonchildbearing use adequate contraception ; Written inform consent obtain subject . Subjects must : Participate trial use nonregistered product ; Use immunosuppressant , blood product , another influenza vaccine study ; Have virologically confirm influenza within 1 year ; Have allergic acute disease ; Have unstabilized serious chronic disease ; Be lactate female .
